question: What type of data will be stored in the cloud?
How much data will be stored in the cloud?
How frequently will data be accessed and updated in the cloud?
How important is data consistency and durability?
answers: High (data must always be consistent and durable)
Medium (occasional data loss or inconsistency is acceptable)
Low (data loss or inconsistency is acceptable)

question: What level of security is required for the data?
answers: Low (no sensitive data is being stored)
Medium (data is sensitive but not highly classified)
High (data is highly classified or sensitive)

question: What is the budget for cloud storage/database?
What kind of access is required for the data?
answers: Read/Write (users can view and modify data)
Read/Write/Delete (users can view, modify, and delete data)

question: What is the expected growth rate of the data?
What is the expected workload of the application that will be using the cloud storage/database?
What kind of architecture is the application running on?
